spells.name: Air Step
spells.description: Tread unsteadily on air, with limitations.

spells.name: Animal Purpose Training
spells.description: Animal gains a new general purpose.

spells.name: Anonymous Interaction
spells.description: Creatures forget details about you and conversations with you.

spells.name: Focused Scrutiny
spells.description: Gain skill bonuses when interacting with the target.

spells.name: Heightened Reflexes
spells.description: Each ally in area gains a +10 bonus on one Reflex save.

spells.name: Investigative Mind
spells.description: Roll twice and take the higher roll when using certain mental skills.

spells.name: Marching Chant
spells.description: Allies can hustle without penalty while you sing or chant.

spells.name: Mindlocked Messenger
spells.description: Target gains a message that can be given only to its intended recipient.

spells.name: Muffle Sound
spells.description: Allies gain a bonus on Stealth checks but risk verbal spell failure.

spells.name: Path of Glory
spells.description: Create an expanding glow that heals allies within it of 1 hp of damage.

spells.name: Silent Table
spells.description: Give yourself privacy by muffling sound leaving the area.

spells.name: Sonic Scream
spells.description: Create a cone of damaging sound at will.

spells.name: Whip of Spiders
spells.description: Create a whip made of poisonous spiders.
